text: Isabelle Berro-Amadeï (born 24 October 1965) is a Monégasque judge and politician. She became the acting Minister of State in 2025. In 2022, she became the Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Monaco. She was a judge at the European Court of Human Rights from 27 June 2006 to 1 August 2015."Composition of the Court", European Court of Human Rights, www.echr.coe.int. On 10 January 2025, she was appointed acting Minister of State after Didier Guillaume was hospitalised. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Ministers of State of Monaco
title: Isabelle Berro-Amadeï
